content.text: Match ends, Hércules 1, Recreativo 1.
Second Half ends, Hércules 1, Recreativo 1.
Jorge Morcillo (Recreativo) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Fran Mérida (Hércules) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jorge Morcillo (Recreativo).
Attempt blocked. Alexander Szymanowski (Recreativo) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Recreativo. Conceded by Leandro Cabrera.
Offside, Recreativo. Jordi Matamala tries a through ball, but Jesús Berrocal is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Ángel Montoro (Recreativo) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Jesús Rubio (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Fran Mérida (Hércules).
Attempt missed. Anaitz Arbilla (Hércules) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the right.
